seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, education requirement is bachelor's level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer', responsibilities focus on BI/DW reporting, ETL, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting/visualization, ETL/Data Integration tools mentioned (DataStage, Informatica, ADF)

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management responsibilities; focus is on individual technical delivery

primary_cloud.evidence: Nice-to-have skills include AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure - no primary cloud specified

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure are all mentioned as preferred experience

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, ETL tools, and reporting - typical batch processing environment

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as nice-to-have, which is cloud-native orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: BI/DW focus implies data warehouse environment; Cognos reporting tool typically connects to data warehouses

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, India implies relocation may be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, location restricted to India

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location restricted to India, no mention of student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: Location restricted to India implies authorization to work in India is required

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at IBM, typical W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career path mentioned, only general 'relentless focus on quality and continuous improvement'

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with business and technical team members, suggesting collaboration with experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions or advancement opportunities

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have (Cognos, UNIX, 3+ years) and nice-to-have (cloud platforms, ETL tools) skills

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on BI/DW reporting, ETL, and Cognos development with specific technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience requirement is reasonable for mid-level BI/Data Engineer role with specific technical skills
